fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Hatred: Every 5th attack you make against the King will be Upgraded.
- Suffocate: If you are in the same room with the King, you will deal them 1 HP of unblockable damage at the end of the phase. You may choose to not have this activated.
- Exclusion: If you are in the game, the King will not be Outsider-aligned.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Track: Learn where the King visits tonight at the end of the phase. [2 uses, Day]
- Hidden Key: Go to the Kingâ€™s Quarters. [1 use, UOR2]
- Backup: Draw 2 extra cards immediately. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Prepared: Upgrade a card. [1 use, Unique, UOR2]
